Yes.
Lyle. Lyle?
We can do it.
We can do it. We can take our show on the road.

translation.en: You and me, like we always planned.

♪ A brand-new me and you ♪

Let's go. Let's go.
Where are you going? Why is he all dressed up?

translation.en: Rich. What?
But he doesn't need money. He needs a family and a home.

translation.en: This is the business of show, Josh.

translation.en: Because Lyle is not just a crocodile. He's a showman.

translation.en: Bye.
Does he even want that?
Josh, tonight is our big night.

translation.en: The night for what?
The preview for potential investors in our new show.

translation.en: Evangelyne will get us there just in time.

Hector?
Ah. Wish us luck.
Take a look at us now.
Hey, how'd it go?
Oh, the stage can be a cruel mistress.
I thought Lyle had changed, but he hasn't.

translation.en: He froze.
Stage fright.
He still won't sing for an audience.

translation.en: Just so you know,
I don't care if you sing or not.
Either way, I think you're awesome.

translation.en: Just give him a little time, okay?

translation.en: He's gonna be okay.

a radical renegotiation, you know?

♪ Now ♪

Okay, great.
Get the money.
Show business.

translation.en: Just not at 3:00 in the morning.

to sign the petition, and override the school's power

translation.en: to allow awful families like this...

He wrestles on a trampoline we'll get rid of.

translation.en: Sure, but if it's not that, and it's something else,

translation.en: Do you mind if I join you?
Valenti. Alistair Grumps.
translation.zh: 瓦伦蒂. 阿利斯泰尔·格鲁普斯.

translation.en: Alistair Grumps.
How in the world are you?
Wait, is that the same sofa?
translation.zh: 等一等, 还是同样的沙发吗?

translation.en: You literally have not changed a thing.
translation.zh: 你的东西一点都没变, 对吗?

translation.en: You see, Alistair and I grew up together.
translation.zh: 阿利斯泰尔和我一起长大.

translation.en: Have you been drinking? Yes, I have.
translation.zh: -你喝酒了吗? -是的, 事实上我有.

translation.en: I always feel like the world looks better with a glass of champagne.
translation.zh: 因为我总觉得喝了一杯香槟 让世界看起来更美好

translation.en: A glass of champagne.
Get out. This is none of your business.

translation.en: It is, it is, because if the Primms are the problem,
translation.zh: 是的. 因为如果普里姆有麻烦

translation.zh: 那么我, 作为他们的客人, 我也有麻烦, 对吗?

translation.en: A very large part. HECTOR: With your permission,
translation.zh: 很大的麻烦. 在你的允许下, 我也想成为解决方案的一部分.

translation.en: I'd like to be part of the solution as well.
translation.zh: 在你的允许下, 我也想成为解决方案的一部分.

translation.en: Would you mind, please?
Thank you.
Delicious. Per usual, Hector, you're overstepping.

translation.en: HECTOR: We are not the only ones who overstepped the mark.

translation.zh: 例如, 我们还没安装 闭路电视在整个小区,

None.
No. No. Were releases signed?

translation.en: No. HECTOR: No.
Well, if it was me,
I'd go straight to the police. Mm-hm. [SCOFFS]
Out, all of you.
Everyone, get out of here.
Come on.

Not you.
I can assure you, Alistair, we have absolutely nothing to talk about. Heh.

Oh! Thank you so much. That was incredible.
No, no, no. You have all been extraordinary. It was the least I could do.

So I have to make myself presentable.
I'll be back in two shakes of a lamb's tail, okay?
Hide him.
Now. Go.
Stay here.
Hector, Hector.

Lyle.
You have to sing.
Now.

Watch your step there. Easy.
You're clear.
Josh. I'll talk to him.

Lyle. Hey, buddy.

translation.en: or chicken Milanese with a dash of salsa verde?

He's a very special crocodile, but he is still a crocodile.

translation.en: No, no. We can break him out. Josh.
translation.zh: -不. 我们可以救他出来. -乔希!

translation.en: But I'm not scared anymore.
Because of Lyle.
He changed everything for me.
And not just for me.
For you too. So...
I'm not gonna leave here.
I'm not just gonna leave here without...
Leave here without... Josh?

translation.en: Wait, Josh, Josh, Josh. Oh, my God.
Josh, are you okay?
translation.zh: 乔希. 乔希! 你没事吧?

translation.en: Josh. Get his inhaler. It's in his jacket.
translation.zh: -你能拿到他的吸入器吗? -在他的夹克里.

translation.en: Call 911.
He had a panic attack that triggered his asthma.
translation.zh: 他的惊恐发作引发了他的哮喘.

translation.en: It's good he had his inhaler with him.
He's gonna be fine. You got nothing to worry about.
translation.zh: 他会没事的. 你们没什么好担心的.

translation.en: Thank you, sir.
You okay, bud? Yeah.
You sure? Yeah.

translation.en: Hey.
Can you believe it?
I still can't believe it. We're gonna be on Show Us What You Got.

translation.en: That's great.
You deserve it.
Listen.
Don't give up.
When Malfoy escaped, I thought I'd never see him again either.
translation.zh: 当马尔福逃走时, 我以为我再也见不到他了.

translation.en: Malfoy? The pet rattlesnake my crazy Uncle Ernie gave me?
translation.zh: 马尔福? 我疯狂的厄尼叔叔 给我的宠物响尾蛇.

translation.en: He was gone for six weeks. We all thought he was dead.
translation.zh: 他消失了6星期. 我们都以为他死了

translation.en: Until the neighbors found him in the back of their toaster oven.
translation.zh: 直到有一天邻居们发现他 蜷缩在他们的烤箱后面.

translation.en: Miracles do happen, Josh.
translation.zh: 奇迹真的会发生, 乔希.

translation.en: There he goes.
Mom, I'm fine. I know you're fine.
translation.zh: 妈, 我没事. 我知道你没事.

translation.en: I'm gonna make sure you stay that way.
translation.zh: 我要确保你保持这样. 走吧.

translation.en: Where you going?
Taking the trash out. Okay.
Be careful. Yeah, be careful.
How could you do it?
I've asked myself the same question over and over, Josh.
translation.zh: 我不停地问自己同样的问题, 乔希.

translation.en: But, you see, I've got nothing.
translation.zh: 但是你看, 我什么都没得到.

translation.en: No family, no friends.
translation.zh: 没有家庭, 没有朋友.

translation.en: Then why do you keep leaving him?
translation.zh: 那么为何你不断离开他?

translation.en: When Lyle choked,
I had to go back and make it on my own.
Again. Yes.
But I couldn't, because no one's interested in...
translation.zh: 但是我不能因为没有人...

translation.en: me.
And I owe a lot of people a lot of money, Josh.
translation.zh: 而且我欠很多人的钱, 乔希.

translation.en: A lot of money.
So when Alistair Grumps offered me that cash, I had to take it.
translation.zh: 所以当阿利斯泰尔·格鲁普斯 给我那笔钱, 我必须接受.

translation.en: Out of need, out of fear, out of weakness.
translation.zh: 出于需要, 害怕, 懦弱.

translation.en: And I've hated myself for doing it.
Good, because I hate you too.
But this is not about me, or about you. It's about Lyle.
translation.zh: 但是这不是关于我或你. 这是关于莱尔.

translation.en: And you know as well as I do, we can't leave him in that zoo.
translation.zh: 你也深知我们不能留他在那动物园里.

translation.en: So if you have the stomach for it,
if you have the fire in your belly I know you have,
translation.zh: 如果你肚里有那团火, 我知道你有

translation.en: you have,
you, young man, are going to help me break that crocodile out of the zoo.
translation.zh: 你, 年轻人, 将帮我救那鳄鱼离开那动物园.

translation.en: Yes, because we have magic on our side.

translation.en: The power of illusion.
Magical magic.

Join us live tomorrow, right here in New York City.

May I have some assistance, please?
I thought I had this trick down, but I've got myself in a bit of a pickle.

translation.en: Please. Uh...
Okay. Thank you.
Some sort of handcuff trick?

translation.en: This looks crazy. Maybe if you move that way...

translation.en: Magical magic.
Let me out of here.
This won't take long. I promise.

translation.en: No, you can't go in there. You can't go in there.

translation.en: Come back here. Come back here.
Lyle.
Lyle.
Not Lyle. Not Lyle.
Not good.
This was seriously your plan?
I knew you'd come.
Yes. Climb up there, and catch my rope, please.

translation.en: You have to get me out of here.

translation.en: Josh?
Come on. Josh. Lyle.
Lyle.
Lyle.
Help me. Help me.
Lyle.

Josh?

translation.en: It's you.
But...
I-I realize I may not have always acted in the best way possible, Lyle.
translation.zh: 我知道我可能 不是以最好的方式行事, 莱尔.

translation.en: But I showed you the world.
I introduced you to white truffle oil.

translation.en: I taught you the moonwalk.
